
= Pencil =

http://i.imgur.com/x6LAJ.gif

You can use this tool to freehand draw.

  # Press with the left mouse button for [ForegroundColor Foreground Color], and right mouse button for [BackgroundColor Background Color].
  # Drag the mouse to draw.
  # Release the mouse button.


== Cancel ==

You can cancel the operation pressing the right button before you release the left one (or viceversa if you start the process using the right button).
